title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of Sync (1GILQD5)
description: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar in the same directory (project), an out of sync message is displayed when overwriting the exported jar file for the second time. It seems that the exported jar file includes itself, which may be causing this issue.
OB: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar in the same directory (project), an out of sync message is displayed when overwriting the exported jar file for the second time.
EB: The exported jar file should not include itself to avoid the out of sync message when overwriting it.
SR:
1. Open the project
2. Export the project as a jar file
3. Place the exported jar file in the same directory as the project
4. Overwrite the exported jar file
5. Notice the out of sync message is displayed
